Alex K Gold leads the Solutions Engineering team at RStudio. He lives in Silver Spring, MD.

Before coming to RStudio, Alex was a data scientist working on economic policy research, political campaigns, and healthcare. He is a proud economics PhD dropout.

When not data nerd-ing, Alex is a life-long martial arts enthusiast (Tang Soo Do, Small Circle Jujitsu, and Tai Chi), loves doing handstands, and is very into home improvement.
